message.content:
I need to find the line item and value that represents the systematic allocation of depreciable assets over their useful life. This is the definition of depreciation.

Looking at the income statement, I can see there is a specific line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45745.79 on 2024-01-29.

Depreciation represents exactly what the task is asking for - the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45745.79'} }
```
